name: Instant Pot® Ham
author: Brandi Doss Russell
summary: This is one reason I love my Instant Pot®. I can pull a frozen ham from the freezer, put it in the Instant Pot® with just 3 ingredients and, with almost no effort, have dinner on the table.
directions: Place ham on a trivet and set it inside a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Sprinkle brown sugar and drizzle maple syrup on top
Secure the lid with vent closed
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 35 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
Cut ham into slices and place on a plate
Select Saute setting on the pressure cooker
Mix cornstarch with water until smooth
Stir mixture into the pot, bring to a boil, and stir until thickened
